## Feature.assemble property

Assemble the feature source from options. The feature source object can thereafter be passed to [makeWebshell()](./webshell.makewebshell.md) utility.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly assemble: (options?: O) => AssembledFeature<O, E, P>;
```
